sn48.18:4.3: The faculties of faith, energy, mindfulness, samādhi, and wisdom.
sn48.18:4.6: Someone who has completed and fulfilled these five faculties is a perfected one. If they are weaker than that, they’re practicing to realize the fruit of perfection … a non-returner … practicing to realize the fruit of non-return … a stream-enterer … practicing to realize the fruit of stream-entry.
sn48.18:4.7: Someone who totally and utterly lacks these five faculties is an outsider who belongs with the ordinary persons, I say.”
